title: Endcap with Aligned Membership Pricing (Merch Slider) (Open Selector)
description: Inserts a slider with merch items.

widget.description: Selector to find the node where the slider will be inserted.
widget.label: Insert Selector

widget.description: Method to use when inserting the slider relative to the selected node.
widget.label: Insert Method

widget.description: RecheckForElement: If the selector is not found, wait up to 3 seconds for it to show up. SelectMultipleElements: If the selector matches multiple places, do you want to insert at each of them?
widget.label: Insert Options

widget.description: Group of products to put in the slider.
widget.label: Merch Set

widget.description: Minimum number of items before triggering the fallback set, if applicable.
widget.label: Minimum Number of Items

widget.description: Maximum number of merch items to have in the slider.
widget.label: Maximum Number of Items

input.name: sliderTemplate
input.value:
May we suggest

{{SLIDER}}
{{PAGINATION}}
x

Why don't we show the price?

Some manufacturers impose minimum advertised prices restrictions. If we lower the price of an item to a certain levels, we can only show that price in the cart. If you change your mind about the item, simply remove it from your cart. The savings are worth a few extra clicks.

widget.description: Include an HTML template to build the slider structure. Placeholder example: '{{slider}}'. Possible placeholders: slider, pagination. Optionally, add the attributes 'data-prev-button' and 'data-next-button' to add previous and next slide buttons. If optional arrow images are included, elements with the attribute 'data-prev-button' and 'data-next-button' are required for them to display.
widget.label: Slider Container Template

input.name: itemTemplate
input.value:
{{name}}

Non-Member {{alternate_price|priceFormat: $1,000.00}} Good Sam Club {{price|priceFormat: $1,000.00}} Price {{price|priceFormat: $1,000.00}} Member price displayed in cart ?

View Details

widget.description: Placeholder example: '{{price}}'. Possible placeholders: alternate_price, brand_name, description, name, out_of_stock, pid, price, product_url, purchase_count, secure_thumbnail_image, thumbnail_image.
widget.label: Slide Template
CSS
widget.description: CSS appended to the DOM in a <style> or <link> element. Use the placeholder '#MONETATE-ID' as the selector for action's wrapper id.
Orientation of the slider.
widget.label: Orientation
Infinite Slide
widget.description: Should this slide infinitely or stop at the end of the slider?
Slides visible by browser width. 'Infinity' breakpoint is required. Example: {"Infinity": {"peekLeft": 0.5, "visible": 5, "peekRight": 0.5}}
widget.label: Slides Visible

widget.description: Number of items to slide on navigation button click.
widget.label: Slide By Increment

widget.description: Previous button creative. Must include element with the attribute [data-prev-button] Slider Container Template.
widget.label: Previous Button Creative

widget.description: Next button creative. Must include element with the attribute [data-next-button] Slider Container Template.
widget.label: Next Button Creative
Rows/Comumns
widget.description: How many rows (horizontal) or columns (vertical) should the slider have?
Number of milliseconds before auto rotating to the next slide. Leave blank or use 0 to prevent auto rotate.
widget.label: Auto Rotate Duration
Pause Auto Rotate on Hover
widget.description: Should auto rotation pause on slider hover?

widget.label: Stop Auto Rotate on Interaction
widget.description: Should auto rotation stop on slider interaction?
Duration in milliseconds of slide animation. Leave blank or use 0 to prevent animations.
widget.label: Animation Transition Duration

widget.description: Type of slide transition animation to use.
widget.label: Transition Animation

widget.description: Type of slide pagination to use.
widget.label: Pagination
Pinned Products
widget.description: Products 'pinned' to the beginning of the merch set.

widget.label: URL Parameter
widget.description: URL Parameter to be appended to item links. ex: name=value. To add multiple, just put '&' between them. ex: name=value&nameTwo=valueTwo.
